hero.title: Developers
hero.subtitle: Get matched with open source projects where your skills are most needed.

items.title: Accessibility
items.paragraph: We have designed a seamless experience to make researching and contributing to open source software a straightforward and rewarding experience.

items.title: Centralization
items.paragraph: We strive to create a perfect match with projects that fit your skills and interests. We selected and categorized the most contributor friendly projects so you no longer have to search for hours for the right opportunity.

items.title: Personalization
items.paragraph: We help you take control of your open source profile and display the contributions and sucesses you are most pround of.

processItems.title: 1. Visit
processItems.text: Visit <ExternalLink noDecoration orange href='https://explore.ovio.org'>Explore</ExternalLink> and discover our curated list of open source projects

processItems.title: 2. Log in
processItems.text: Log in to personalize your experience

processItems.title: 3. Add details
processItems.text: Fill out your profile to get matched to more project and task opportunities.

processItems.title: 4. Spread the word
processItems.text: Share your experience with your community and beyond. Post details of your experience on social medias, talk with your friends...

hero.title: Companies
hero.subtitle: Open source community management for developer teams
hero.subSubtitle: The best tech talents value open source

items.title: Give your employees access to a variety of open source opportunities
items.paragraph: Ovio accumulates a large portfolio of curated open source projects. We match developers to projects and tasks that matches their skills and interests.

items.title: Activate the dev community on your open source projects
items.paragraph: Showcase your open source projects and build your tech credibility. Ovio lets you grow, manage, and present your open source program to help you attract and hire a more diverse tech team.

items.title: Engage your employees on open source projects you use
items.paragraph: Encourage your engineering teams to contribute to open source code and build an open culture. Ovio makes contribution to open projects easy to help you retain and attract tech talents.

items.title: Track you metric and make an impact
items.paragraph: Engage your team on impactful projects and take your community engagement to the next stage. In addition to your open source efforts, showcase your impact commitment and build your employer branding

block2feedback.author: Sylvia Thornton

processItems.text:
Keep Track of your contributions and level of influence

Reward external contributors and dedicated employees

Identify project maintainers and increase retention

Showcase your work!

hero.title: Students & Universities
hero.subtitle: Develop your technical skills and do good at the same time!
hero.subSubtitle: Ovio connects students and faculties to amazing opportunities to give back, in local communities and internationally.

block1intro.title: We help student groups, CS classes, teachers and faculties accelerate tech for good on campus!

items.title: Find the right project
items.paragraph: Ovio accumulates a large portfolio of software development projects (250+) to include every type of engineering skills and interest in the social impact sector. We help you find local and international opportunities.

items.title: Develop your skills
items.paragraph: Volunteer alongside other talented developers from around the world. Develop new skills or improve existing ones while collaborating on an impactful project.

items.title: Showcase your work
items.paragraph: Expose your code and showcase your work to a worldwide community of tech employers. Better your Github profile.

processItems.title: Projects
processItems.text: Partner with us to find the right project for your class/group

processItems.title: Mentors
processItems.text: Partner with us to find mentors
